description: This course provides a study of chemical stoichiometry and equilibrium at a level and pace
appropriate to students with little or no background in chemistry. The combination of this course
and Chemistry 123 (offered during Interim) provides coverage of topics equivalent to those in
Chemistry 125.  Students planning to continue in chemistry should consider concurrent registration
in MATH 119 or 120.  Students attend three classes and one three-hour laboratory per week.
Offered annually in the fall semester.
